verses.verse: Thus hath the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H7200>shewed<s%> unto me; and, behold, he <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H1462>grasshoppers<s%> in the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of the shooting <S%H5927>up<s%> of the latter <S%H3954>growth<s%>; and, lo, it was the latter <S%H3954>growth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1488>mowings<s%>. grasshoppers: or, green worms

And it came to pass, that when they had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H398>eating<s%> the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, then I <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, <S%H5545>forgive<s%>, I beseech thee: by whom shall <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%>? for he is <S%H6996>small<s%>. by: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> for this: It shall not be, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Thus hath the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H7200>shewed<s%> unto me: and, behold, the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H7378>contend<s%> by <S%H784>fire<s%>, and it <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%>, and did eat <S%H398>up<s%> a <S%H2506>part<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, <S%H2308>cease<s%>, I beseech thee: by whom shall <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%>? for he is <S%H6996>small<s%>. by: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> for this: This also shall not be, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
Thus he <S%H7200>shewed<s%> me: and, behold, the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> upon a <S%H2346>wall<s%> made by a <S%H594>plumbline<s%>, with a <S%H594>plumbline<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H5986>Amos<s%>, what <S%H7200>seest<s%> thou? And I <S%H559>said<s%>, A <S%H594>plumbline<s%>. Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, Behold, I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H594>plumbline<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I will not <S%H3254>again<s%> pass <S%H5674>by<s%> them any more:

And the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H3446>Isaac<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, and the <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be laid <S%H2717>waste<s%>; and I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Then <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5986>Amos<s%> hath <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against thee in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: the <S%H776>land<s%> is not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3557>bear<s%> all his <S%H1697>words<s%>.

For thus <S%H5986>Amos<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1540>surely<s%> be led away <S%H1540>captive<s%> out of their own <S%H127>land<s%>.

Also <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5986>Amos<s%>, O thou <S%H2374>seer<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%>, flee thee <S%H1272>away<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and there <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> there:

But <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> not <S%H3254>again<s%> any more at <S%H1008>Bethel<s%>: for it is the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4720>chapel<s%>, and it is the <S%H4467>king's<s%> <S%H1004>court<s%>. chapel: or, sanctuary king's court: Heb. house of the kingdom

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H5986>Amos<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H558>Amaziah<s%>, I was no <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, neither was I a <S%H5030>prophet's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>; but I was an <S%H951>herdman<s%>, and a <S%H1103>gatherer<s%> of sycomore <S%H8256>fruit<s%>: sycomore: or, wild figs

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> me as I <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> unto my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. as: Heb. from behind

Now therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: Thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> not against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5197>drop<s%> not thy word against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3446>Isaac<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Thy <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be an <S%H2181>harlot<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and thy <S%H127>land<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> by <S%H2256>line<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> a <S%H2931>polluted<s%> <S%H127>land<s%>: and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1540>surely<s%> go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> forth of his <S%H127>land<s%>.
